definitions.text: exercising by repeatedly assuming a crouching position with the knees bent; strengthens the leg muscles
the act of assuming or maintaining a crouching position with the knees bent and the buttocks near the heels

examples: In some cultures, the women give birth while squatting
The children hunkered down to protect themselves from the sandstorm

definitions.text: be close to the earth, or be disproportionately wide
short and thick; as e.g. having short legs and heavy musculature
examples: some people seem born to be square and chunky
a dumpy little dumpling of a woman
dachshunds are long lowset dogs with drooping ears
a little church with a squat tower

definitions.text: having a low center of gravity; built low to the ground
